thread.title: City officials to represent Charlotte in China
thread.title_full: City officials to represent Charlotte in China

author: Staff reports
title: City officials to represent Charlotte in China
text:
City officials to represent Charlotte in China 
They’re part of an economic development delegation 
Staff reports Order Reprint of this Story 
Charlotte City Council member Patsy Kinsey and Economic Development Director Bill Cronin plan to represent the city as part of a delegation to China Oct. 25 to Nov. 11. 
The Carolinas Chinese Chamber of Commerce, N.C. Department of Commerce and The Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries planned the trip to leading commercial and industrial cities. 
“This is a great opportunity for us to tell our story and establish key business relationships,” Kinsey said in a statement. Council member Patsy Kinsey MARK HAMES mhames@charlotteobserver.com i
